title: Pset_PipeSegmentOccurrence
description: Pipe segment occurrence attributes attached to an instance of IfcPipeSegment.

InteriorRoughnessCoefficient.title: InteriorRoughnessCoefficient
InteriorRoughnessCoefficient.description: The interior roughness coefficient of the pipe segment.

Color.title: Color
Color.description:
The color of the pipe segment.

Note: This is typically used only for plastic pipe segments. However, it may be used for any pipe segments with a painted surface which is not otherwise specified as a covering.

Gradient.title: Gradient
Gradient.description: The gradient of the pipe segment.

InvertElevation.title: InvertElevation
InvertElevation.description: The invert elevation relative to the datum established for the project.
